alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grant, northwestern Jefferson, southeastern Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Benton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton... Bryant... White Hall... Haskell... Redfield... Cane Creek... Pine Bluff Arsenal... East End... Orion... Hensley Island... Salem in Saline County... Bauxite... Shaw... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Tar Camp Park... Woodson... Dexter... F.B. Baugh Recreation Area... Hensley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and southeastern Arkansas.
